text: Oddesund Bridge () is a road and railway bascule bridge that crosses the Oddesund strait between the peninsulas of Jutland and Thyholm in Denmark. It connects mainland Jutland with the historical region of Thy. It is on the Thy railway line between Struer and Thisted. ==See also== *List of bridges in Denmark *List of bridges *Sallingsund Bridge Category:Bridges in Denmark Category:Railway bridges in Denmark Category:Road-rail bridges Category:Bascule bridges Category:Bridges completed in 1938 Category:1938 establishments in Denmark Category:Limfjord
title: Oddesund Bridge
